[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin](./react-rsbuild-plugin.md) &gt; [ExtractStrConfig](./react-rsbuild-plugin.extractstrconfig.md) &gt; [strLength](./react-rsbuild-plugin.extractstrconfig.strlength.md)

## ExtractStrConfig.strLength property

The minimum length of string literals to be extracted.

**Signature:**

```typescript
strLength: number
```

## Remarks

Default value: `20`<!-- -->.

## Example


```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'
import { pluginReactLynx } from '@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginReactLynx({
      extractStr: {
        strLength: 10,
      },
    })
  ],
})
```
